title: Infinity War is Gonna Crush at the Box! - The Kinda Funny Morning Show 04.11.18
description:
Nick and Andy talk Infinity War pre-sale numbers, Bond 25 casting news, Jumanji saves Sony, and a heartfelt farewell to a comedy legend.

-Avengers infinity war beating black panther to set new presales record (18:10 mins)
-Daniel Craig says Bond 25 is his next project (20:55 mins)
-Dwayne Johnsons jumanji becomes sonys highest grossing film ever (30:15 mins)
-Isle of dogs japanese poster (37:00 mins)
-Mitzi Shore passes away (37:50 mins)

Thanks to https://Twitter.com/kumailh for our timestamps!

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Nick - http://www.twitter.com/Nick_Scarpino
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Tim Gettys, and Nick Scarpino talk about the biggest stories in nerd culture.
